mapper.select: SELECT relid as relId, indexrelid as indexRelId, schemaname as schemaName, relname as relName, indexrelname as indexRelName, idx_scan as idxScan, idx_tup_read as idxTopRead, idx_tup_fetch as idxTupFetch FROM pg_stat_user_indexes WHERE idx_scan = 0 ORDER BY indexrelid LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT schemaname, tablename, indexname, tablespace, indexdef FROM pg_indexes ORDER BY indexrelid LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
